QuestData.Title: Call of the Gladiator
QuestData.Description: Your merciless rampage has not gone unnoticed, gladiator. So many of your enemies have fallen before your might. It is because of your unrelenting savagery that Imperator Mar'gok himself has requested your presence at the grand Highmaul Coliseum. It is at Highmaul that a battle of epic proportions awaits.$B$BShould you heed the call of the gladiator, present this sigil to my brother, Kharg. He is the arena master residing outside of the Coliseum in Nagrand.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Sigil of Highmaul to Kharg outside the Highmaul Coliseum in Nagrand.
